title: Show additional info for unit and currency converter

body:
- Link to documentation about unit converter on the settings page
- When using the converter, apart from `>>`, now  the separators `>` and `-` are recognized for conversion
- Also on the settings page, now there is a list of all supported units, with the proper localization

![Updated settings page for Unit Converter](https://github.com/MM2-0/Kvaesitso/assets/1476503/dd14b31c-83f0-4621-bdb6-de79b9973375)
